title: Could use some help creating a Nami avatar
body:
Sooo...I'm terrible with photo editors, and have no experience with the advanced tools I want/need to use (you know, everything MS Paint doesn't have).

I'm wanting to create a picture of Urf the Nami-tee posing like the Slayer Jinx catface sticker.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} http://i.snag.gy/mtVJQ.jpg

I started by simply sketching it in pencil (it'd be even worse starting in the editor without a template) and after putting it on my computer started outlining it...but I quickly realized it was never going to come out good.

*So*, any advice? I'm using Gimp 2 and could use a basic tutorial to perfect the outline and color it in, *or* just commission it for a Mystery Chest :3

This is the mess I left when I gave into inevitability;
http://i.snag.gy/vc5zJ.jpg

Edit 1: Progress. Still don't know what I'm doing, but things happened.

https://i.gyazo.com/2f1ca3ad0ced3952cf084d41e113a369.png

Edit 2: Ok, this is the best it's getting. Done.

https://i.gyazo.com/03997f1f589b3111fbf6da216055f8db.png

[Oh, also, head over here for an easy comic contest for a Mystery Skin!](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/w0VUrhjY-take-this-and-create-your-own-captions-for-a-mystery-prize) . Winner decided at 4:30 PM PST Dec. 31st

replies.body: wait for new nami skin first

Hey, DTM!  If I were to offer any advice, it would be to cheat more!  I took a partial try at doing the icon myself, taking the original Slayer Jinx icon as the template to trace over:

http://i.imgur.com/XKkQJ07.png

With Nami's eyes, she looks pretty creepy :D  But you can see that I just put the image into an editor, scaled it waaay up (easier to work big and scale down) and then scribbled the differences in the shapes as best I could.  Don't know if my scribble will be of use to you, or if you'd be better starting over yourself (probably the latter) but I hope you have luck with your drawing!  As esmelar says, don't give up!
That face is the face of Nightmares, alongside Lollipoppy and the Luxarim.
Bio, no offense, but that is terrifying.  We need to keep that as a sticker now!

I didn't start over that one, but I've made another with your help ;3

https://i.gyazo.com/563ecf4d48eb49cdc2f85431b9b70c00.png

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TPu2Ejor,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2016-01-01T00:52:05.143+0000)
>
> I didn't start over that one, but I've made another with your help ;3
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/563ecf4d48eb49cdc2f85431b9b70c00.png

Ha!  That's pretty awesome :D
She's got a wacky-waving-inflatable-tube man arm, but I'd spent enough time on it already XD

Took me around a few hours, but I think i finally got it. I really hope this helps. I think this is one of my best works yet, so I'm pretty proud of it.
http://imgur.com/kH8pVlw
P.S If you are butthurt ignore this reply
I actually made an urf party Nami, when I saw it I thought it would be a great icon for you! I'll try to send it through here.

I can help with that!
Add me on skype, akenero, shurima icon

sorry i cant even draw this https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/94/Stick_Figure.svg/170px-Stick_Figure.svg.png

EDIT: MY EYES MY EYES IT HURTS MY EYES

The body looks pretty good, the face and arm is what looks a little off to me, but i'm sure it's really hard to do. Might wanna check out some pictures on google of other cartoons doing the same pose and fine one with the easiest arm position. Showing debth is very difficult, but needed for the pose. 

but ya the body looks fantastic ^o^
I could do it for you if I could find a manipulable Nami model... I shall look for you >_<
We all start somewhere, dont give up!!!! :D
